name: Mohammad S Anwar
bio: Mohammad is a CPAN [contributor](https://metacpan.org/author/MANWAR). He enjoys submitting pull requests and speaking at Perl Conferences. He runs the [Perl Weekly Challenge](https://perlweeklychallenge.org). He is also co-editor of [Perl Weekly newsletter](https://perlweekly.com). Find out more about him on his [website](http://www.manwar.org).
